fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, attack a player. If you kill them, that roles is obliterated from the game, killing all other players with that role, preventing that role's ability from ever being used again (ie: necromancer), and preventing other players from becoming that role for this game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - This role destroyed role 4170, causing it to not exist.
